message.help-message:
Welcome to Sagrada! Usage: -h/--help Get this help message -g/--gui Set the preferred UI mode to GUI -c/--cli Set the preferred UI mode to CLI -a/--server-address ipv4_address Set the ip address of the server -r/--rmi Set the preferred connection mode to RMI -s/--socket Set the preferred connection mode to Socket
By choosing no options default options will be set: ip: 127.0.0.1 ui: GUI connection mode: socket
